content.raw:
True! :) sorry a little stressed today as you might've noticed in your inbox. ;) Edit: Ah you fixed it now, I already thought I'm starting to go crazy.

Looks good to me now. If you're able to fix the texture on the red coupling part that would be great (the texture is very distorted and the edges of the cylinder not very visible which hinders edge based model tracking), but otherwise it looks good I think.
content.html:
True! :) sorry a little stressed today as you might've noticed in your inbox. ;) Edit: Ah you fixed it now, I already thought I'm starting to go crazy.

Looks good to me now. If you're able to fix the texture on the red coupling part that would be great (the texture is very distorted and the edges of the cylinder not very visible which hinders edge based model tracking), but otherwise it looks good I think.
